title: Mutton Rezala
procedure: Soak almonds in water for 1 hour, then peel and grind to a paste.
Heat oil in a pan and saut√© onions till golden brown.
Add ginger garlic paste and cook till the raw smell disappears.
Add lamb shanks and sear on high heat.
Add almond paste, turmeric, and coriander powder.
Pour in milk and cook till the gravy thickens.
Add saffron milk and kewra water and simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve hot.
